theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Somatic Maintenance and Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on investment in somatic maintenance and enhanced cellular stress resistance as mechanisms underlying longevity, consistent with classic disposable soma concepts emphasizing somatic durability.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Somatic Maintenance and Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes trade-off between reproduction and somatic maintenance with accumulation of molecular damage causing aging, fitting the somatic maintenance and damage accumulation theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Somatic Maintenance and Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes evolutionary trade-offs between reproduction and maintenance leading to imperfect repair and aging, aligning with somatic maintenance and damage accumulation mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Somatic Maintenance and Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on resource allocation trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance, with energetic costs shaping lifespan, consistent with somatic maintenance disposable soma theory.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Germ Line Versus Soma Resource Allocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights preferential resource allocation to germ line maintenance at the expense of soma, emphasizing germ line immortality versus somatic aging, a distinct disposable soma subtheme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Somatic Maintenance and Stress Resistance Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes life-history trade-offs where investment in reproduction reduces somatic maintenance causing accelerated aging, fitting the somatic maintenance and damage accumulation theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Investment and Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on energy allocation hierarchy prioritizing somatic maintenance over reproduction during early adulthood, highlighting reproductive investment trade-offs within disposable soma framework.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Investment and Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes increased late-life reproductive output and survival shaping longevity, reflecting reproductive investment trade-offs central to disposable soma theory.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Investment and Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows increased reproductive traits with age and prolonged reproductive longevity, illustrating reproductive investment trade-offs influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Investment and Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reproductive senescence and decline in reproductive effort with age, reflecting reproductive allocation trade-offs within disposable soma theory.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Investment and Somatic Maintenance Trade-off Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes life history trade-offs where reproductive costs modulate longevity and caloric restriction effects, fitting reproductive investment and somatic maintenance trade-off theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction Adaptive Resource Reallocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes adaptive resource reallocation from reproduction to somatic maintenance during dietary restriction, emphasizing evolutionary basis of DR-induced longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction Adaptive Resource Reallocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dietary restriction as an adaptive response reallocating resources from reproduction to somatic maintenance, consistent with DR evolutionary adaptation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction Adaptive Resource Reallocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes caloric restriction slowing aging and extending lifespan, serving as benchmark for aging retardation, fitting dietary restriction and resource reallocation theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction Adaptive Resource Reallocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details caloric restriction effects on lifespan extension and aging retardation via reduced somatic damage, aligning with dietary restriction and resource reallocation mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction Adaptive Resource Reallocation Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores caloric restriction mechanisms including oxidative damage attenuation and immune senescence delay, consistent with dietary restriction and somatic maintenance reallocation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS pathway regulation of aging and lifespan extension via reduced signaling, a conserved nutrient sensing mechanism linked to disposable soma theory.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS reduction elevating stress resistance and proteostasis, linking insulin signaling modulation to aging and disposable soma mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details downregulation of IGF-1 signaling extending lifespan and enhancing oxidative stress resistance, fitting IIS reduction and disposable soma framework.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows dietary lipid unsaturation modulating IIS pathway gene expression and lifespan, linking metabolic regulation via IIS to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on PI3K/Akt/Foxo pathway regulation of aging and longevity, with Pten modulating IIS signaling to promote lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores neuronal insulin signaling and resistance in aging-associated diseases, highlighting complex IIS roles in aging and neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Reduction Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes peripheral IGF-1 overexpression accelerating aging in major depressive disorder, illustrating dualistic IIS effects on aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Aging Biomarker Disposable Soma Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes reproductive system aging as a biomarker of organismal aging, linking reproductive decline to systemic aging processes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cognitive Resource Depletion Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on limited cognitive resources and vigilance decrement with aging, representing a distinct mechanistic theme outside classical disposable soma but related to aging resource allocation.
